summary: It's a high-kicking battle on the dark side when an ace vampire slayer and his beautiful sidekicks wage the ultimate martial-arts showdown with one of the most dangerous of the undead.
cast: Ekin Cheng|Josie Ho|Mickey Hardt|Edison Chen|Anthony Chau-Sang Wong|Mandy Chiang|Chapman To|Charlene Choi|Gillian Chung|Jackie Chan|Spencer Lam|Tat-Ming Cheung|Karen Mok|Matt Chow|Maggie Lau|Hing-Ka Chan|Jack Ng|Marky Lee Campbell|Philip Chen|Jason Chong|Michael Clements|Don Ferguson|Ryûki Kitaoka|Winnie Leung|Bey Logan|Ricardo Mamood-Vega|Robert Meister|Digger Mesch|Philip Ng|Daniel O'Neill|Simon Robida|Tung So|Mark Strange|Matthew Sturgess|Daniel Whyte
title: The Twins Effect
